name: She's Grieving
description:
Grieve; feels intense sorrow about. 

I always grieve for something or a person that I love, if you don't grieve, how would you remember? I choose to grieve rather than forgetting it.

Grieving makes you remember forever.

p/s : I hope anyone who gets this art will understand and learn that grieving is not all bad, choose to keep the good memories and appreciate every hardships you are faacing.
